seo.description: Learn more about Ihantsa RAKOTONDRANAIVO, Full-Stack Developer & AI Engineer specialized in React, Next.js, Flutter, Python.

intro.paragraph1: Hello! I'm Ihantsa RAKOTONDRANAIVO, a passionate Full-Stack Developer & AI Engineer based in Madagascar. I specialize in creating modern web and mobile applications using cutting-edge technologies.
intro.paragraph2: With over 5 years of experience in software development, I've worked on diverse projects ranging from e-commerce platforms to AI-powered applications. I'm particularly passionate about React ecosystem, Flutter for mobile development, and integrating AI solutions.
intro.paragraph3: When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community. I believe in continuous learning and staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends.

tourmada.title: Full-Stack Web & Mobile Developer (Internship)
tourmada.description: Designed and deployed the Tourmada platform using Django, React, Flutter, PostgreSQL, and Gemini API. Built a complete tourism solution with web and mobile interfaces.

armh.title: Freelance Web Developer
armh.description: Developed responsive websites with focus on UX optimization and basic SEO implementation. Delivered modern web solutions for various clients.

lutherienne.title: IT Manager (Internship)
lutherienne.description: Analyzed production workflows and deployed optimization systems. Managed IT infrastructure and improved operational efficiency.

hackathon.title: AI-Assisted Evaluation - Hackathon ESMIA 2025
hackathon.description: Built a React/Django prototype with Gemini API to make exams interactive. Developed an innovative AI-powered assessment platform.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about working with me.

q1.question: What's your typical response time?
q1.answer: I usually respond within 24 hours during business days. For urgent matters, feel free to call.

q2.question: Do you work with international clients?
q2.answer: Absolutely! I work with clients worldwide and am comfortable with different time zones.

q3.question: What technologies do you specialize in?
q3.answer: I specialize in React, Next.js, TypeScript, Flutter, Python, and AI integration. Always learning new technologies.

q4.question: Do you offer ongoing support?
q4.answer: Yes, I provide maintenance and support services for all projects I develop. Let's discuss your needs.
